channel.title: RSBuddy & my computer
channel.description:
I just bought a new computer and thought I should have a bunch of bot accounts and make RSGP from doing this. I was wondering how many bots I could have open maximum. Here are my system specs:
[img]http://oi53.tinypic.com/29fukuf.jpg[/img]
My RAM is expandable to 16GB.
This is what I bought: [url=http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Gateway+-+Desktop+/+Intel%26%23174%3B+Core%26%23153%3B+i5+Processor+/+8GB+Memory+/+1TB+Hard+Drive/3155928.p?id=1218380518359&skuId=3155928&ci_src=11138&AID=10474050&PID=4166869&SID=kyicpi29g94d&URL=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2FGateway%2B-%2BDesktop%2B%2F%2BIntel%2526%2523174%253B%2BCore%2526%2523153%253B%2Bi5%2BProcessor%2B%2F%2B8GB%2BMemory%2B%2F%2B1TB%2BHard%2BDrive%2F3155928.p%3Fid%3D1218380518359%26skuId%3D3155928%26ci_src%3D11138&ref=39&CJPID=4166869&loc=01]http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Gateway+-+Desktop+/+Intel%26%23174%3B+Core%26%23153%3B+i5+Processor+/+8GB+Memory+/+1TB+Hard+Drive/3155928.p?id=1218380518359&skuId=3155928&ci_src=11138&AID=10474050&PID=4166869&SID=kyicpi29g94d&URL=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2FGateway%2B-%2BDesktop%2B%2F%2BIntel%2526%2523174%253B%2BCore%2526%2523153%253B%2Bi5%2BProcessor%2B%2F%2B8GB%2BMemory%2B%2F%2B1TB%2BHard%2BDrive%2F3155928.p%3Fid%3D1218380518359%26skuId%3D3155928%26ci_src%3D11138&ref=39&CJPID=4166869&loc=01[/url]
Andrew Ferguson recommended that computer to somebody else. I liked it so now I have it, thank you Andrew :3

item.title: RSBuddy & my computer
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:13, topic:418488”]This is what I’m at right now with 8 bots open, all running around & doing something.

I’m also hosting a server…[/quote]
Just checked task manager and mines is using up 300mb of ram :L. you could bot a lot of acc’s x]. I was just making a guess, I remember when bots used to require like 700mb aha.

I have no idea how much cpu they use or i would have estimated more o.0

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy & my computer
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

10 i’d say…
that gives each bot a nice 780’ish mb of ram and 1.3 or so ghz proccessor?

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy & my computer
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:10, topic:418488”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=521029.msg3785694#msg3785694 date=1318850892]

Yay someone followed my idea, I run about 40 in the background and still have 70% of the cpu available.

No, just log in on your main account with a proxy, then dont login again

The rs buddy accounts each run on a shell, so basically a mini proxy, you could login every bot on the same world on rsbuddy, so no matter how much you bot on rs buddy it’s not linked to your main account by ip.

How much RAM do you have?
[/quote]
That number was from when I had 8 like you, heads up, the only thing that sucks about the computer is that if you want 16gb of ram you have to buy 4 4gb ram sticks. :/[/quote]

Thanks for the info.

Read full topic

item.title: RSBuddy & my computer
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Yay someone followed my idea, I run about 40 in the background and still have 70% of the cpu available.

No, just log in on your main account with a proxy, then dont login again

The rs buddy accounts each run on a shell, so basically a mini proxy, you could login every bot on the same world on rsbuddy, so no matter how much you bot on rs buddy it’s not linked to your main account by ip.
[/quote]

How much RAM do you have?[/quote]
That number was from when I had 8 like you, heads up, the only thing that sucks about the computer is that if you want 16gb of ram you have to buy 4 4gb ram sticks.

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Yay someone followed my idea, I run about 40 in the background and still have 70% of the cpu available.

smokin flax:

No, just log in on your main account with a proxy, then dont login again

The rs buddy accounts each run on a shell, so basically a mini proxy, you could login every bot on the same world on rsbuddy, so no matter how much you bot on rs buddy it’s not linked to your main account by ip.
